title: Java
description: Strongly typed, Programing language that builds code to the JVM.

title: C#
description: Strongly typed, Programing language that builds code to the .NET CLR.

title: C++
description: Strongly typed, Programing language that builds code directly to the OS.

title: JavaScript
description: Weakly typed, Programing language interpreted by browsers.

title: TypeScript
description: A superset of JavaScript. It adds strong typed features to JavaScript.

title: HTML
description: Markup language used to create web pages.

title: CSS
description: Style sheet language used to manipulate the presentation of web pages.

title: SQL
description: Language used to manipulate data in a Relational Databasase Management System (RDBMS).
